org.codehaus.groovy.grails.webflow.engine.builder
[Groovy] Class RuntimeRedirectAction

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.webflow.action.AbstractAction
      org.codehaus.groovy.grails.webflow.engine.builder.RuntimeRedirectAction

class RuntimeRedirectAction
extends org.springframework.webflow.action.AbstractAction

Takes the parameters formulated in the builder and produces an ExternalRedirect at runtime.

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
1.0
